programme.desc: Bold and beautiful Ilakkiya finds happiness in making others happy. Circumstance leads to her tying the knot with her friend Gautham. Can Ilakkiya create her destiny, despite Gautham's controlling aunt Bairavi & her conniving cousin Anjali?

programme.title: LAKSHMI
programme.desc: Maha, her family’s financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the family’s peace and happiness to test.

programme.title: ANANDA RAGAM
programme.desc: Unfortunate events force an ambitious Eashwari and a school dropout Azhagar to tie the knot. Can this odd couple turn their marriage into a happily ever after? Will Eashwari realize her IPS dream amidst life's many hardships?

programme.title: Movie - WINNER
programme.desc: Frustrated with Shakti's rebellious nature, his parents send him to stay at his grandparents' house where he falls in love with Neelima. But he is shocked to learn that her marriage is already fixed.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Movie Contd - WINNER
programme.desc: Frustrated with Shakti's rebellious nature, his parents send him to stay at his grandparents' house where he falls in love with Neelima. But he is shocked to learn that her marriage is already fixed.

programme.title: RAMAYANAM
programme.desc: When Sita, the wife of Prince Rama of Ayodhya, is abducted by Ravana, the Asura king of Lanka, Rama sets out to liberate her with the help of various allies.

programme.title: Annam
programme.desc: Exuding warmth & courage, self-reliant Annam, living with an estranged father and a cruel stepmother, longs for a loving bond to escape her home. Will she find the love she seeks?

programme.title: Kayal
programme.desc: Abandoned by her father and coping with an alcoholic brother, Kayal works as a nurse to be her family's sole provider. She finds happiness in her sacrifice to meet the needs of her brother and sisters. Watch Kayal stand tall in her selfless journey.

programme.title: Marumagal
programme.desc: Aathirai's unyielding passion for helping others constantly lands her in trouble, while Prabhu's self-serving actions show disregard for his own family's well-being. Follow their tumultuous journeys as fate brings them together in marriage.

programme.title: Moondru Mudichu
programme.desc: Nandini is a self-assured girl who puts her family’s happiness above hers. On the other hand Surya hates his mother due to lingering resentments and deliberately bonds with Nandini to cause strife. Watch what destiny has in store for Nandini & Surya.

programme.title: Singapenne
programme.desc: Born into a humble & rustic background troubled by familial & financial concerns, Anandhi takes it upon herself to leave home & fearlessly pursue a better life for her family. Watch her bravely face the odds of life with unwavering spirit.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: ETHIRNEECHAL THODARGIRADHU
programme.desc: Urged by her father, Janani is always a high achiever. But her marriage into a patriarchal family dashes her dream of a career. Thus begins Janani's arduous journey towards empowering her family's oppressed women to unleash their power.

programme.title: AADUKALAM
programme.desc: Sathya loves her sister like a second mother & believes compassion outweighs all riches. But, Selvanayagi, a woman of pride & privilege, worships money & social status. When their worlds collide, what trials will Sathya face in her fight for justice?

programme.title: Malli
programme.desc: Things take a momentous shift when a bold & loving village girl, Malli, crosses paths with a doting father and his 6-year-old daughter who yearns for a mother's love. Join the family's journey through the nuances of love, affection & parenthood.

programme.title: Les Pays D'en Haut - EP 6

programme.title: Antibes, Cap Sur L'azur
programme.desc: Through an exploration of Antibes and its ambition for a more sustainable future we meet fishermen and sailors along with the athletes preparing for the Paris 2024 Paralympics. Between local traditions and gastronomy, Antibes reveals the wealth of its heritage and its cultural diversity...

programme.title: Baisers Voles
programme.desc: After his military service, Antoine Doinel has a series of odd jobs: night watchman, TV repairman, warehouseman... Then he is employed as a ''mole'' by a specialist agency. His mission: get employed by a business to discretely watch its employees and what goes on there...

programme.title: Invincible
programme.desc: Behind the steering wheel of a car, a young boy holds back his tears and his breath while a female voice speaks to him on the telephone. Based on a true story, the last 48 hours of the life of Marc-Antoine, aged 14, confronted by his urgent need for freedom.

programme.title: La Bataille Pour La Foret - EP 1
programme.desc: How can we protect the forests of tomorrow if we don't understand the forests of yesteryear? Today, researchers attempt to travel back in time for a better vision of how the forests are reacting to the climate change that's already happening.

programme.title: Bleu Ocean - EP 2
programme.desc: From the most well-known fisheries to forgotten techniques, from fresh tuna processing to Polynesia's most iconic dish: a journey in the wake of an essential fish.

programme.desc: BMX has been around for a long time, but it particularly thrilled spectators at the Paris 2024 Olympics. Marion Rousse meets those who practice this sport, seeking its thrill, in the heart of the city.

programme.title: La Vigne Est Belle - EP 6
programme.desc: November. The winegrowers prepare the vineyards and warehouses for the winter. It's time to blend the year's wines and for the Mexican and Guatemalan seasonal workers to return home. The year ends with tastings, good 'piquettes' recipes, retirement for some and concerns about climate change.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin

programme.title: L'epicerie - EP 7
programme.desc: On the baby food shelves, purees are being dethroned. A close look at the range of so called textured meals sold in stores. Also covered: naan bread, from tradition to industrialization; miso paste; the origins of the pretzel.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 129
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 39
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Bande De Sportifs ! - EP 13
programme.desc: The intrepid journalist, Theo, goes out to meet young athletes to get an introduction to their disciplines. Each sport has its own unique rules, equipment and history.

programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Wilder - EP 5
programme.desc: Rosa Wilder drives Mettler, the prosecutor, to the spot where another body has been found. Mettler is nervous: fingerprints have been found. Could they be his? Ten years ago. Lukas, Mettler and Koller caused an accident. Two victims: Jesch's wife and daughter.

programme.title: Wilder - EP 6
programme.desc: Ten years ago Jesch, seriously injured, has a visit from two police officers, Zimmermann and Koller, and the prosecutor, Mettler. They promise Jesch they'll investigate, he believes them. _x000D_Present day. Rosa Wilder and Manfred Kägi are in search of Jesch, unaware that it's Mettler who triggered the series of murders.

programme.title: Nadine Sierra Et Pretty Yende A La Philharmonie De Paris
programme.desc: Accompanied by the Frivolites parisiennes orchestra, conducted by Giacomo Sagripanti, sopranos Pretty Yende and Nadine Sierra, rising stars in lyrical arts, offer a sparkling and eclectic recital on the stage of the Philharmonie de Paris. Rossini, Verdi, Bellini, Massenet, Bernstein, Delibes, Gounod and Offenbach revisited!

programme.title: La Voie Royale
programme.desc: Farmers' daughter Sophie is a brilliant sixth-form student. Encouraged by her maths teacher she leaves the family farm for Lyon, to prepare for the Grandes Ecoles. She rapidly realises that her dream of attending the elite Polytechnique are less about passing an exam than the true challenge of social mobility...

programme.title: Les Mains Sales
programme.desc: The St Lawrence Valley, 1759. The daily life of Marie, a native slave in the service of a surgeon, is gloomy and alienating. Until the day she meets a little girl she assumes to be her child.

programme.desc: It's time for the harvests and festivities as a family or among friends and colleagues. Everyone's happy at harvest time: at Pigeon Hill, Nival, L'Orpailleur, Bergeville, Negondos, Lieux Communs, Chateau de Cartes, St-Jacques and La Bauge, the vines are heavy with fruit.

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 2
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Pompon Ours - EP 17
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis - EP 45
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: Conte-Nous ! - EP 18
programme.desc: A long, long time ago, in the heart of the African savannah, animals still had the gift of speech. It was also a time of story-telling, of tales that had so much to teach us, where the main character was a lion, a hyena, a leopard or a frog.

programme.title: Sam & Julia - EP 49
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Droners - EP 2
programme.desc: 95% of the planet Terraqua is covered by its oceans. Corto, Arthus, Enki and Mouse make up the Tikis, a team from the idyllic archipelago of Nui. They have the firm intention of winning the ''Whale Cup'', the biggest drone race ever.

programme.title: Api ! - EP 5
programme.desc: Api, worried about her friendship problems, can't keep up in class. When the teacher points it out, she starts crying in front of the whole class.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard - EP 49
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 35
programme.desc: Felix, Manolo and Lounis find a lottery ticket and think they've won the jackpot. After fighting over the prize, they realise they've only actually won five dollars.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou - EP 6
programme.desc: Malisha, age 10, accompanied by Rikitou, her little woollen doll, heads off for fabulous adventures in search of the Koka Kitoumbou stone. No ordinary stone, it has magical properties and amazing powers, notably that of turning whatever it touches into sweet treats.

programme.title: Les Grandes Grandes Vacances - EP 8
programme.desc: Autumn 1943. The date of the armistice of the First World War is approaching. Resistance is growing in the village, and the inhabitants are increasingly committed to the cause. However, this demands great caution because not everybody sees things the same way.

programme.title: Matiere Grise - EP 6
programme.desc: The magazine programme which takes the mystery out of science, encouraging us to think... without all the brain work!

programme.title: Mission Apprentis - EP 6
programme.desc: In front of the cameras and within a limited time, six apprentices will have to take on a professional challenge and give their best to convince experts.

programme.title: Le Beau Velo De Ravel - EP 5
programme.desc: A bike journey, presented by Adrien Joveneau, along the entire RAVeL network, an independent cycle path network in Wallonia. With each programme, the presenter tells us of a stage in his journey and talks about mobility and tourist resources in the region.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera - EP 51
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'Azur.

programme.title: Waouh ! - EP 15
programme.desc: Nathalie Simon travels the French regions to meet extreme sports enthusiasts. Land, water, air: no matter their preferred playground, they share their passion and favourite places. They also offer a unique way to explore an area of the country. From high-level athletes to adrenaline junkies, there's emotion and excitement a-plenty!

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 3
programme.desc: Lourdes Pluvinage is the pioneer of Peruvian chefs. She came to France in 1988, drawn by a love story. She left Peru but brought the culinary flavours of her childhood with her and opened the first Peruvian restaurant in Paris: El Picaflor.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match - EP 48
programme.desc: She has one of the most impressive records in savate in France and internationally: French champion Chloe Nandi reflects on her career.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Pa T'mentir - EP 8
programme.desc: Colourism is the principle of creating a hierarchy depending on whether someone's skin tone is lighter or darker. The phenomenon, rife within all racially identified communities, is both real and taboo. Where does it come from and how can we put a stop to it?

programme.title: Serge A Paris - EP 8
programme.desc: Serge meets the singer Gregoire, who tells him about the creation of the song ''Toi + Moi''. We then follow him to the grand premiere of the musical ''Bernadette de Lourdes'', and his meeting with the likeable Belgian singer Axelle Red.

programme.title: Green - EP 1
programme.desc: We head to the heart of French Guiana, a territory where 97% of the land is covered by Amazonian forest. Antoine Auriol meets Philippe Lova Jah, Elvis, Mariana, Anais, Dave and Francisco, working to protect this natural treasure, and discovers the Kaw marshlands, veritable refuge for biodiversity.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 8
programme.desc: Versailles: we visit Le Grand Controle, former residence of the king's finance minister, today a hotel. All about the history of the dinner jacket. With its roots anchored firmly in the glory of Napoleon's empire, Arthus Bertrand launches a jewellery collection. How to wear a ''nuisette'', the short French nightdress.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 5
programme.desc: Direction for to visit Rodin's home and studio. Ceramic artist Gregoire Scalabre sculpts and accumulates to enter another dimension, between tiny and gigantic. The John Galliano show for Maison Margiela: a journey through time and the strange. Artist Amandine Antunes masters the stucco marble technique.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Miracle Suisse
programme.desc: The programme that (finally) explains the ins and outs of Swiss well-being, and offers the keys to understanding that renowned ''Swiss attitude. A fun guide to Homo Helveticus, using archive footage from years past and recent times, all in a light-hearted, sunny mood with plenty of laughter thrown in.

programme.title: On Est Rendu La - EP 9
programme.desc: How important are religion and spirituality in today's world? Laura, Nabil and Maricielo show us a very different aspect of their faith and help to break certain cliches.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Le Monument Prefere Des Francais 2024
programme.desc: The French selected fourteen monuments from those put to the vote this year. Which monument will be their favourite? To present the viewers' rankings, Stephane Bern hosts us in an exceptional location: the Chateau de Rambouillet, in the French department of Yvelines, in the greater Paris region.

programme.title: Un Pere Ideal
programme.desc: Michel, the good-natured owner of the only cafe in a little Normandy village, sees his life turned upside down when his daughter is murdered. In a short space of time, he goes from ideal father to prime suspect. Jeff, the village priest, provides his only support. Michael is released due to lack of evidence and he struggles to rebuild his reputation.

programme.title: Movie - Thozha
programme.desc: Vikramadhitya, an entrepreneur with physical disabilities, hires Seenu, a convict out on parole, as his caretaker. Together, they help each other with their struggles and develop an unlikely bond.

programme.title: Movie - Unnaruge Naan Erunthal
programme.desc: After her father's sudden death, Mahalakshmi is left to clear his debts and face the harsh villagers. A taxi driver helps her cremate her father and pledges his taxi to earn her a temporary reprieve.

programme.title: Movie - Machie
programme.desc: Dushyant, a rich spoilt brat, arrives from Mumbai to study in a college in Kovai. As a fresher in a medical college, he meets four of his classmates who are not city slickers like him and come from middle-class families.

programme.title: Movie - Mahan Kanakku
programme.desc: Jeeva's brother-in-law is harassed by bank officials despite having paid off all loans. When he finally commits suicide, Jeeva takes advantage of the loopholes in banking to teach them a lesson.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Seena Thaana 001
programme.desc: Thamizharasu, an aspiring cop, learns about a terrorist attack against the governor and informs a police officer. When he discovers that the officer is involved too, he sets out to foil the attack.

programme.title: Movie - Dhilluku Dhuddu
programme.desc: Kumar and Kajal are in love, but her father is against the match and tries to have Kumar killed with the help of Mani. Things go awry when Mani invites Kumar's family to a haunted house.

programme.title: Movie - Kalakalappu (New)
programme.desc: A man struggles to save his family-owned restaurant as it is running losses. He soon falls for a health inspector keen on shutting down the place. When his brother enters the scene, things get worse.

programme.title: Movie - Kaakki Sattai
programme.desc: Mathimaran, a police officer, learns about an organ donation racket from his lady-love, Divya. During the course of his investigation, he uncovers shocking secrets and faces unexpected obstacles.

programme.title: Movie - Thimiru Pudichavan
programme.desc: Murugavel, a police officer, sets out to bring a positive change in society. However, he faces trouble from the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Movie - Thadaiyara Thaaka
programme.desc: A young man dreams of making a fortune in Chennai; he owns a travel agency and is all set to marry his lover. After he crosses paths with a loan shark, the latter is killed mysteriously. The young man runs for cover and plans to find the murderer.

programme.title: Movie - Maharani
programme.desc: A young man marries a beautiful woman but never tells her about his former girlfriend. As the couple settles into matrimony, his ex-lover makes a shocking return and complicates their relationship.

programme.title: Movie - Maharantham
programme.desc: Shankar, who loves Kalpana, promises a dying father that he will marry his terminally ill daughter Geeta. He marries them both. His devotion towards Geeta causes trouble between him and Kalpana.

programme.title: Fillers

programme.title: Movie - Viyabari

programme.title: Movie - Kushi
programme.desc: College friends Jenny and Shiva part ways due to a misunderstanding. Despite being in love and realising that they cannot live without each other, their egos prevent them from uniting.

programme.title: Movie - Naadodigal
programme.desc: Karunakaran, Chandran and Paandi fight tooth and nail to unite their friend Saravanan with Prabha, but an unfortunate incident changes the trio's lives for the worse.

programme.title: Movie - Kovil
programme.desc: Sakthivel and Angel, whose parents are sworn enemies, fall in love with each other. Things take a turn when Angel's father asks her to take her religious vows.

programme.title: Movie - Ratchasan
programme.desc: Arun gives up on his dream of becoming a filmmaker and takes up the job of a police officer after his father's death. He then attempts to track down a psycho killer.

programme.title: ASO Cycling Programming 2025
programme.desc: The Volta a Catalunya is a road bicycle race held annually in Catalonia, Spain. It is one of three World Tour stage races in Spain, together with the Vuelta a España and the Tour of the Basque Country. Raced over seven days, it covers the autonomous community of Catalonia in Northeast Spain and contains one or more stages in the mountain region of the Pyrenees. First held in 1911, the Volta a Catalunya is the fourth-oldest still-existing cycling stage race in the world.

programme.title: ASO Cycling Programming 2025
programme.desc: Eschborn-Frankfurt is an annual semi classic cycling race in Germany, starting in Eschborn and finishing in Frankfurt. The event, sometimes referred to as the Frankfurt Grand Prix, is held annually on 1 May, national Labour Day in Germany. The event was first held on 1 May 1962. The race passes through the Taunus Hills west of Frankfurt, along a winding and hilly course with around 1500m (5,000 feet) of climbing.

programme.title: Halo World Snooker Championship 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 15
programme.desc: Steve McManaman revisits ten standout moments from his Premier League career, from his breakthrough at Anfield to unforgettable solo goals and Merseyside derby magic. With flair, humour and personal insight, PL Moments takes you inside the story of one of the Premier League's most creative and entertaining players.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 10
programme.desc: Michael Owen burst onto the scene for Liverpool at just seventeen years of age, and in two consecutive seasons the teenage sensation won the Premier League Golden Boot. Owen recalls those campaigns for the Reds, reliving the key moments that helped him develop into one of the greatest players of his generation.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 1
programme.desc: Dietmar Hamann was an influential presence in the Liverpool side of the early 00's. The German international recalls some memorable matches and rivalries for the Reds.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 1
programme.desc: Extended sit-downs and more informal 'out and about' interviews with the Premier League's biggest stars, providing players with a platform to tell their story in their own words.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 11
programme.desc: When Arne Slot guided Liverpool to their 20th League title in his debut season, it marked the beginning of a new era, yet echoed a familiar tradition. Explore the rich legacy of Liverpool's managerial transitions, where through decades of change, one constant endures: the club's remarkable ability to evolve and triumph, through seamless succession.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: Over the past 9 years, Jurgen Klopp has been an integral Premier League figure. With the help of former and current colleagues, fans, and friends, we look how he made the Reds a force to be reckoned with once again.

programme.title: PL BEST OF... PREMIER LEAGUE ICONS: THE TIMELESS COLLECTION
programme.desc: A curated collection of the most iconic Timeless moments from past PL Moments, 1 to 11, Art Of... and PL GOATs shows, featuring the game's top legends.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 1
programme.desc: Dietmar Hamann was an influential presence in the Liverpool side of the early 00's. The German international recalls some memorable matches and rivalries for the Reds.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 10

programme.desc: From free-kicks to solo runs, scissor kicks to 30-yard screamers, Goals of the Season revisits some of the most memorable strikes from the 24/25 campaign, whilst paying homage to the Golden Boot winner.

We speak to those closest to him to highlight his early years, struggles, and determination, shedding light on the pivotal moments that shaped his journey to becoming a Premier League legend with Liverpool.

programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Igeu Kabesa vs. Humphrey Mulenga
programme.desc: In this episode Igeu 'Smiley' Kabesa meets Humphrey 'King Cobra' Mulenga for the World Lightweight Championship.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Yuriorkis Gamboa vs. Marcos Ramirez
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features undefeated featherweights Yuriorkis Gamboa, 'El Cinclon de Guantanamo', (11-0, 9 KOs) and Marcos Ramirez (25-0, 16 KOs) from the Pechanga Resort and Casino in Temecula, California, USA, on October 4, 2008. The two young fighters had a quick ending street brawl that brought the crowd to its feet.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Thirty finalists return to Venice Beach with a chance to land one of 15 spots in Las Vegas. In addition to the qualifying round's 6 obstacles, athletes must tackle 4 additional challenges--including the all-new Cannonball Alley!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Sergio Mora
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing off with Sergio Mora with a highly disputed and controversial decision you will have to see to believe! The two never had a rematch. Also on the card, action from WBC Super Welterweight champ Jermell Charlo.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 4 from Dolphins Areana in Nagoya, Japan features Takanosho, Chiyonokuni, Onosho and Hidenoumi.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best judo of the World Team Championships from Budapest, where we will see history made as it's the first time a new mixed gender team format will be seen.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features ring girl Arianny Celeste making a high schooler's dreams come true when she goes as his date to his prom. Also, we catch up with Clay Guida and Urijah Faber at the LA Fit Expo and we go behind the scenes for an intimate photo shoot with beautiful ring girl Amber Nicole.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Andre Berto vs. Miguel Rodriguez
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features undefeated Andre Berto (21-0, 18 KOs) battling Miguel Angel Rodriguez, aka 'Miki', (29-2, 23 KOs)i for the vacant WBC Welterweight Title from the FedEx Forum in Memphis, Tennessee, USA on June 21, 2008. Bonus coverage includes Chris 'The Nightmare' Arreola (23-0, 21 KOs) vs. Chazz Witherspoon (23-0, 15 KOs).

programme.title: Mega Fights In 60 Joel Julio vs.James Kirkland
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a Super Welterweight, 10 Round contest featuring Joel Julio (34-2, 31 KOs) vs.undefeated James Kirkland, aka 'Mandingo Warrior' (24-0, 21 KOs) from the HP Pavilion in San Jose, California, USA on March 3, 2009.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 11: Bangkok, Thailand - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Muay Thai and Martial Art of Punches, Kicks, Elbows and Knees with Masters Thakoon Pongsupha and Karim Pattana.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Ricky Hatton
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather, Jr., in the final bout before his first retirement from boxing, facing Ricky Hatton in a superfight. Mayweather has referred to Hatton as one of the toughest competitors he has ever had to face. Also on the card, a young Saul (Canelo) Alvarez continues to rise in the rankings.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 5 from Dolphins Arena in Nagoya, Japan features Hakuho, Ichinojo, Terunofuji and Takanosho.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Rusty Derouen
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector 'Macho' Camacho (46-3-0, 20 KO) battles Rusty Derouen (33-6-0, 25 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from Erie, Pennsylvania, USA.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Dricus du Plessis vs. Martin Van Staden
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts headlined by a welterweight title fight between Dricus du Plessis and Martin Van Staden. Bonus coverage includes a lightweight battle between Mthobisi Buthelezi and Luke Michael and a bantamweight clash between Bill Thusi and Tjaart Henning.

Episode 5 from Dolphins Arena in Nagoya, Japan features Hakuho, Ichinojo, Terunofuji and Takanosho.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: The crew gets their first ping on their new creature-helping app! A dried up jellyfish-type creature has been discovered at a construction site, and the anti-creature contractor wants it GONE. The crew try taking Jelleen to the sewers to live with Sewer Koi, but the unhappy creature creates a blackout in the sewers with its magical electric charge.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: When a mysterious creature keeps stealing people’s prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yi’s prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S2 - EP 35
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.desc: Tip and Oh use Slushious as an inter-planetary taxi but Tip takes it too far; Smek becomes homeless and must accept Oh's help.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! S1 - EP 26
programme.desc: Tip gets carried away with Boov-tech and needs Oh's post office pals to save the day; Oh must participate in a ritual dance to become an adult Boov

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: Hardcase follows the crew to the desert and goes to extreme lengths attempting to finally get his revenge on Turbo. // White Shadow loses his good-luck charm and spirals into a streak of terrible luck and the crew must help him find it before things get any worse.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S1 - EP 26
programme.desc: During a visit to a racing convention Turbo is kidnapped by an overzealous fan and it's up to the rest of the FAST crew to save him. // Turbo throws a wild race for his fellow insects, but is surprised when his old nemesis, Guy Gagne, returns for a rematch.

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 - EP 39
programme.desc: Revvithelps Ty unlock his ultimate power to rescue all their friends trapped inside a magnetized mountain by D-Structs, Splitter, Blayde and Pounde

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show S2 - EP 40
programme.desc: Peabody and Sherman continue to make things right on their journey to stop an unlikely band of outlaws unleashed by the Guapos.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: Fleshed Out Wolfie wakes up one morning to every creature's nightmare?he's turned into a human! Messy Business At The Manor When Mosshead has nowhere to go for vacation, Casper invites him to stay at his uncles' house…where he quickly discovers that Mosshead is the world's worst houseguest.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 39
programme.desc: New stickers, with a picture of a mysterious bandit, have appeared in Toyland. Clockwork Mouse begs Noddy to investigate. He finds himself going head to head with jealous Hoof who wants to prove that Noddy isn't the only investigator in Toyland. Hoof thinks he's solved the case in no time, but Noddy's attention to detail makes him realise the bandit isn't quite what he seems.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 - EP 13
programme.desc: Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 91
programme.desc: Primrose has decided to hold a party for Fifi. Everyone is helping get it ready, even Stingo and Slugsy who are in charge of making the cake. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 39
programme.desc: Topsy sets out to make her own book for story time, but everything goes wrong when Raa Raa decides to join her. Can he put things right in time?

programme.title: Go Dog Go! S2 - EP 40
programme.desc: Mayor Sniffington mixed up the dates for the Dogcathalon and it turns out it’s being held today! Panicked, Tag and Scooch rush off to make sure the three race spots are race ready so they can be approved by the Top Dog. / The Dogcathalon Race has officially started! Tag goes into Crew Chief mode, running around to ensure Team Pawston is ready for each part of the race. But with Sam unable to race, he encourages Tag to take his place and win it all for Pawston.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: Chef J tells a tale about unicorns sailing in ships on clouds in search of Unicorn Land.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 30
programme.desc: Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 - EP 31
programme.desc: Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread;the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure - climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 20
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D’Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D’Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S2 - EP 30
programme.desc: When Poppy drops DJ Suki’s prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his "friend" Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. But to both Branch and Poppy’s surprise, it turns out Mr. Glittercakes is real! Who is the mysterious Troll, and why has he chosen to help Branch?

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: When Harper unknowingly drops her cooking camp application on the way to post office, it’s up to the Dew Drops to get it into that big blue mailbox. / When Cassie accidentally places Lola's beloved, old toy wand in a box marked for a giveaway drive in the park, the Dew Drops must find a way to retrieve the wand before it ends up in the hands of an entirely new family.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: Marcus has a piano recital and unknowingly forgets his lucky penny at home. Now it’s up to the Dew Drops to get the penny across town and back into Marcus’ pocket before showtime. / When Nicholas rolls the hamster ball (with Hammy inside) out into the streets, the Dew Drops must get Hammy back home safely.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 15
programme.desc: When accident-prone Rodney gets hired to babysit a mischievous toddler, TZG secretly watches over their safety. / When there’s a power outage in Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly helps the townsfolk beat the blackout.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 16
programme.desc: When both Sam and Gabriel pre-order the new Commander Kale comic but the supplier only sends one copy, TZG secretly ferries the comic book back and forth between readers. / When Fawna teaches a silent yoga class, TZG secretly find and remove a loud chirping cricket from the Community Center.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: Magnus hatches a plan to hide in an egg to spy on the Rescue Riders. But things get all scrambled when a mama dragon takes him to her nest.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop enlist Cruz’s help to perform a dance for Mom’s birthday. Though it’s hard at first, they learn to put their dolphin, unicorn, and narwhal powers together to create something special. / Kelp, Pixie, Ollie, and their friend Leroy try to help Juniper understand her angry feelings.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: Scallop is afraid of her first "tuskist" appointment. Kelp helps her get through it with a song. / Fog rolls in, threatening Kelp’s first Three Moon Festival in Unicorn Land. Kelp and his friends use a combination of unicorn spark and the Kelp Way to create a new festival.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy S3 - EP 62
programme.desc: On their first day at Palomino Bluffs, the girls are determined to make a good impression. Cue the beachfront race - and a daring rescue!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy S3 - EP 63
programme.desc: The PALs run into their old rivals the BUDs on the first day of classes, prompting Lucky to run for class rep. Elsewhere, Abigail helps solve a mystery.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S3 - EP 59
programme.desc: A terrifying ice monster comes from the portal with a grudge against Puss in Boots, but when the sun proves too much for the water based beast, the San Lorenzans help in an unexpected way

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S3 - EP 60
programme.desc: It's Lord Crispintine's Day, and Toby is set on Cleevil as his Crispintine, but after a gang of imps from the portal teach Toby to be a real "bad boy," he learns of their true plans

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 15
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! S2 - EP 30
programme.desc: Tag becomes jealous when Yip prefers to spend time with puppy-sitter Beans instead of with her. Determined to win Yip back, Tag enlists the help of Cheddar Biscuit, Gilber, Spike and Frank to try and win him back. / Frank and Beans find out that Tag and Scooch are trying to get into the Doggy Book of World Records and sabotage every attempt. When Tag and Scooch find out what the sneaky duo are up to, they come up with a plan to outsmart them.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: When Pixie’s pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallop’s special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 - EP 45
programme.desc: Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 - EP 46
programme.desc: Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 - EP 47
programme.desc: After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: In order to retrieve Mr. Krupp’s locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: When Gran announces it’s time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes she’s got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room…), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who’s positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew’s pursuits. When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 15
programme.desc: Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yi’s building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this "Qilin" isn’t an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 16
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot "Qilin" and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season_x000D_1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! S2 - EP 28
programme.desc: On a Koobish cattle drive together, Tip and Krunkle's differences result in Oh and the herd getting lost in a stampede; Tip and Oh can't agree on how to celebrate their Friendiversary

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 - EP 27
programme.desc: Fed up with the rowdy FAST crew, Chet challenges them to go without racing; Skid and Shadow must defend the clubhouse alone against Clip and Clap.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 - EP 28
programme.desc: Burn is forced to coach a lousy tetherball team -- and gets inspired by an old rival; White Shadow's karate skills are tested by a ninja stinkbug.

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 - EP 40
programme.desc: When Pteracopterscrash land in the Flatirons, Ty and crew must go behind enemy lines to save their fallen wingman from savage STEALTH SCRAPADACTYLS

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show S2 - EP 41
programme.desc: After the Guapos steal their show, Peabody and Sherman must track down 3 historical bandits running amuck in NYC.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: Paramedic Paranormal When Jimmy breaks out in hives, Casper and his friends have no choice but to bring him to the human hospital. Back To Ghoul When Casper's uncles Stinky, Fatso and Stretch decide to go back to Scare School, Casper is thrilled.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 40
programme.desc: The pirates are having a spring clean of their galleon, much to the annoyance of Pirate Stripes who wants to go on a treasure hunt. Later that day, the pirate treasure disappears! Oh no! Noddy needs to investigate at once. A strange new galleon appears on the horizon. Could it be Tina the Terrible? Has she stolen the treasure? Using all his detecting skills Noddy follows the clues to the DareDale Caves where he realises that the ship on the horizon isn't Tina the Terrible's galleon at all.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 - EP 14
programme.desc: It's Knights and Dragons Day at school and Pat has to travel to a Welsh castle to pick up some ancient artefacts and Sarah Gilbertson's Auntie Jackie! Pat is rather partial to a suit of armour - and when he's presented with a real one at the castle, he can't resist trying it on! But the suit gets stuck shut, leaving the excitable children wondering where their artefacts are!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 92
programme.desc: Fifi, Bumble and Violet are trying to pick all the blackberries before the wind blows them to the ground. But soon they have something very different to catch as Primrose flies past!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 40
programme.desc: Raa Raa is busy racing round the jungle in his emergency cubbybuggy coming to the rescue for every bump and scrape. But do all his friends really need medical treatment?

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Tag wants to bring her new neighbor, Scooch, to the Party in the Tree. But a series of traffic jams make Tag impatient, and she keeps trying to find different ways to get to the party. Thanks to Tag’s handiness - and one of Lady Lydia’s hats - they make it to the party just in time. \ Pawston’s new canine mail carrier keeps getting chased by dogs, so Tag and Scooch have to help him deliver the mail.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 15
programme.desc: Pixie loves to ride the clouds, but she can't understand why Kelp doesn’t love it, too. If they don't agree on this, does that mean they're not best friends anymore? / Kelp helps Ollie fulfill his dream of watching the white whale migration.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 - EP 21

Their distress grows upon discovering that this "Qilin" isn’t an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 16

While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S12 - EP 129

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands S2 - EP 3

programme.title: Tears Of The Sun
programme.desc: In Tears of the Sun, a Navy SEAL team is sent to rescue a doctor in war-torn Nigeria. The mission shifts from extraction to saving refugees as they face brutal rebels while navigating the dangerous jungle.

programme.title: The Irrational - EP 1
programme.desc: Professor of behavioral science Alec Mercer is called upon to investigate the murder of a fashion influencer whose boyfriend, a decorated soldier and son of a Senator, has confessed to the crime. Mercer suspects there is more to the story than meets the e

programme.title: The Irrational - EP 2
programme.desc: Alec is approached by his old friend CJ, a prominent investigative journalist, who asks for his help after she is poisoned with rare and deadly nerve agent. With time running out, Mercer pieces together scant clues.

programme.title: The Irrational - EP 3
programme.desc: After a passenger plane crashes into the Potomac, suspicions focus immediately on the pilot. Alec and the team are asked to investigate the pilot’s personal motivations and piece together clues in the hopes of revealing the truth.

programme.title: The Irrational - EP 4
programme.desc: Alec and the team take on a kidnapping case at the request of a desperate father. Their investigation is hampered by a complicated family dynamic that slowly reveals everyone’s hidden motivations.

programme.title: The Irrational - EP 5
programme.desc: Alec and the team head to Las Vegas to help Camille, a former colleague turned expert poker player who’s been lured into danger. They must take some risks to solve a gambling mystery before Camille gets hurt. Marisa makes a significant discovery.

programme.title: The Irrational - EP 6
programme.desc: Alec agrees to testify as an expert witness in a wrongful death trial for a friend of Kylie’s. As he faces an old nemesis, he discovers competing emotions around an accidental shooting. Marisa reaches a decision about the bombing investigation.

programme.title: The Irrational - EP 7
programme.desc: Alec’s first date with Rose turns into a 24-hour excursion when they find themselves taking on an investigation involving a forged masterpiece. Marisa and Kylie attempt to revive their friendship, which has faltered since Alec and Marisa’s divorce.

programme.title: The Irrational - EP 8
programme.desc: Alec takes a case involving a young burn victim and arson that forces him to confront some trauma from his past. Phoebe and Rizwan compete for an important research grant.

programme.title: The Irrational - EP 9
programme.desc: After witnessing a hit and run during a friend’s livestream, Alec and Kylie aim to prove it wasn’t an accident. As Marisa and Jace continue their investigation into the church bombing, they turn their sights on a prominent senator.

programme.title: The Irrational - EP 10
programme.desc: Alec and his team come face to face with the man who was put away for the church bombing 20 years earlier. Marisa and Kylie work together to save Alec, Phoebe and Rizwan. Jace makes a critical break in the case that changes everything.

programme.title: The Irrational - EP 11
programme.desc: Alec and Marisa follow clues leading to the bomber behind the church explosion. Kylie secures an FBI interview but her knowledge makes her an asset. Phoebe and Rizwan uncover evidence revealing the truth.

programme.title: Inside Track: The Business Of Formula 1
programme.desc: Formula 1 is the world’s most elite motorsports league with 10 teams, 20 drivers and races that span the globe. CNBC follows the money to find out what fuels its rapid growth and popularity.

programme.title: Cnbc Sport: On The Record
programme.desc: CNBC Sport: On The Record explores the convergence of sports, business, and investing. Each week, we sit down with the biggest names in sports - from league commissioners, team owners, influential media executives and top athletes - to give you an insider's perspective on the strategies, deals, and stories shaping sports and business.

programme.title: Channel Japan 2025/26
programme.desc: Channel Japan offers a fresh look at the latest in the economy, business, technology, culture and sightseeing of Japan.

programme.title: American Greed S1-15
programme.desc: "American Greed" goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich. Their complex scams leave victim's lives in shambles. Each episode is a deep dive into the minds and actions of heartless crooks who live lives most people can only dream of.

programme.title: Pga Tour 2025
programme.desc: Golfing highlights from last weekend's PGA TOUR tournament.

programme.title: World Downhill Skateboarding Championship 2025
programme.desc: The WDSC is the world-leading international series for the spectacular sporting disciplines of Downhill Skateboarding and Street Luge in their purest forms.

programme.title: World Downhill Skateboarding Championship 2025
programme.desc: The WDSC is the world-leading international series for the spectacular sporting disciplines of Downhill Skateboarding and Street Luge in their purest forms.

programme.title: Arctic Race Of Norway 2025/2026
programme.desc: The Arctic Race of Norway (ARN) is a four-day road race held every year in August in Northern Norway’s magnificent scenery. Created in 2013, the event is now established as Scandinavia’s main international cycling event, and one of Norway’s most important sports events, and is part of the UCI ProSeries, the second highest division of cycling races. Each year, several Tour de France teams and some of the world’s greatest cycling stars participate in the ARN and fight for the race’s iconic prizes.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers 2025
programme.desc: "Late Night with Seth Meyers" is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and topical monologue jokes. It is hosted by Emmy Award-winning writer and one of the 2014 TIME 100, Time magazine’s 100 most influential people, Seth Meyers. Previously, Meyers served as head writer on "Saturday Night Live" and anchor on the show’s wildly popular "Weekend Update."

With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: Africa Live

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. programme.title: The Observers
programme.desc: The Observers on France 24 is a weekly show produced with photos, videos and personal accounts from Observers around the world. Top international current affairs are covered by using eyewitness accounts from Observers- people who are at the heart of an event. They send their photos and videos, which are verified and contextualized by France 24 team of professional journalists in Paris. The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.title: Queen of Masks - EP 11
programme.desc: Four friends were involved in a murder, the three turned their backs on the fourth by pinning the accusation on her. Which prompted her to flee to the U.S. Now, ten years later, that fourth friend has returned and plans to uncover the truth.

programme.title: The Long River - EP 12
programme.desc: After a huge flood during the 15th year of his reign, the young Emperor Kang Xi conducts civil service examinations to recruit talented individuals to solve the problems plaguing the Yellow River, allowing the 24-year-old Chen Huang an opportunity to come to the fore.

programme.title: The Ingenious One - EP 2
programme.desc: In the process of traversing the rivers and lakes after ten years of training, Yun Xiang (Chen Xiao) met Shu Yanan (Rachel Momo), a weird and intelligent woman and several others and gradually realized the warmth of friendship.

programme.title: The Ingenious One - EP 3
programme.desc: In the process of traversing the rivers and lakes after ten years of training, Yun Xiang (Chen Xiao) met Shu Yanan (Rachel Momo), a weird and intelligent woman and several others and gradually realized the warmth of friendship.

programme.title: Mental Coach Jegal - EP 6
programme.desc: A former Taekwondo athlete, who is permanently banned from the national team, becomes a mental coach to help players in slump, heal retired athletes and engage a real match against the absurd world of winner-take-all.

programme.title: Evilive - EP 4
programme.desc: The series tells the story of a struggling lawyer Han Dong Soo (Shin Ha Kyun) who gets cases by recklessly visiting prisoners. He meets an absolute villain and transforms into an elite villain himself.

programme.title: Breaking the Shadows - EP 17
programme.desc: Summer 2017, a rain-soaked southern town is rocked by the discovery of dismembered remains. Officer Han Qing (Sun Li) investigates while searching for her missing partner, Zhong Wei (Luo Jin). As the case unfolds, a major drug trafficking operation unveils.

programme.title: Their Wonderful Time - EP 1
programme.desc: When female game designer Song Ling Ling (Zhou Jie Qiong) unexpectedly becomes possessed by the NPC she had created, she finds herself in a comical cohabitation with 'the client', Xiao Ran (Ge Qiu Gu).

programme.title: The Ingenious One - EP 4
programme.desc: In the process of traversing the rivers and lakes after ten years of training, Yun Xiang (Chen Xiao) met Shu Yanan (Rachel Momo), a weird and intelligent woman and several others and gradually realized the warmth of friendship.

programme.desc: In the process of traversing the rivers and lakes after ten years of training, Yun Xiang (Chen Xiao) met Shu Yanan (Rachel Momo), a weird and intelligent woman and several others and gradually realized the warmth of friendship.

programme.title: Their Wonderful Time - EP 2
programme.desc: When female game designer Song Ling Ling (Zhou Jie Qiong) unexpectedly becomes possessed by the NPC she had created, she finds herself in a comical cohabitation with 'the client', Xiao Ran (Ge Qiu Gu).

programme.title: Their Wonderful Time - EP 3
programme.desc: When female game designer Song Ling Ling (Zhou Jie Qiong) unexpectedly becomes possessed by the NPC she had created, she finds herself in a comical cohabitation with 'the client', Xiao Ran (Ge Qiu Gu).

programme.title: The Tale of Lady Ok - EP 7
programme.desc: The story follows legal expert Ok Tae Young (Im Ji Yeon) during the Joseon period whose name, identity, and husband are all fabricated. Entangled in a fierce survival scheme, entertainer Cheon Seung Hwi (Choo Young Woo) is willing to risk his life for her.

programme.title: Evilive - EP 5
programme.desc: The series tells the story of a struggling lawyer Han Dong Soo (Shin Ha Kyun) who gets cases by recklessly visiting prisoners. He meets an absolute villain and transforms into an elite villain himself.

programme.title: Police Station No. 7 - EP 19
programme.desc: WONG YING KOO (SIT KA YIN, NANCY), a jovial optimistic middle-aged woman, is always ready to offer help to others in need. She lives happily with her daughter SUEN MAN WAH (WANG, IRENE) and other members of her family. She is a good friend of her neighbour WONG CHI CHEUNG (HUI SHIU HUNG), whose son WONG KIM (NG KAI WAH, LAWRENCE) respects her and regards her as his own mother. Corruption is a major social problem of the time in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Angels of Missio - EP 3
programme.desc: The Police Counter-Terrorism Unit (CTU) gathers intelligence to fight against terrorist attacks. Three beautiful female officers, SAM (KWOK SONIJA), FA (SHEH CHARMAINE) and BO BO (YEUNG SZE KI, SHIRLEY), who have different personalities, are outstanding members of this unit._x000D_ _x000D_ SAM is a Chief Inspector in CTU. She is decisive and never mixes personal matters with work. FA is good at martial arts and enthusiastic in her job. However, she can be very short-tempered.

programme.title: Brutally Young 2.0 - EP 4
programme.desc: Since starting out more than a decade ago, painter Yiu Sheung-him (Shaun Tam) has not much luck until gallery boss Fong Chi-ho (Joel Chan) and his wife Sung Wai-kei (Candice Chiu) discover an old painting created by Sheung-him 18 years ago. And the couple decide to help him become famous, but Sheung-him is simply not in the mood to feel happy. A moment of vanity causes Sheung-him to forgo his principles which he has been steadfastly following.

programme.title: Kung Fu Master From Guangdong - EP 9
programme.desc: The tale aims at revealing the Kung fu Master WONG KI YING’s life and his righteous character. YING and his colleagues are respected as the "Ten Tigers of Guangdong". The tale is played by Wong Yat Wa, Felix, Leung Tsang, Jay, Lau Kam Ling, Kwok Jing Hung and Kung Fu Masters from the Mainland China. The tale is shot at Yunan Kunming. Audiences will be astonished by the stylish fighting and special landscapes. One will be deeply impressed by it.

programme.title: Golden Faith - EP 36
programme.desc: BEN (LAW KA LEUNG, GALLEN) meets NAM (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) in Australia during a business trip. When he gets back to Hong Kong, he is involved in a robbery and NAM is in charge of prosecution._x000D__x000D_ BEN’s parents died in a ship accident when he was six. His brother was never found. BEN was saved by BON (CHUN PUI). BON treats him like his own son and passes his gold shop business to him.

programme.title: Angels of Missio - EP 4
programme.desc: The Police Counter-Terrorism Unit (CTU) gathers intelligence to fight against terrorist attacks. Three beautiful female officers, SAM (KWOK SONIJA), FA (SHEH CHARMAINE) and BO BO (YEUNG SZE KI, SHIRLEY), who have different personalities, are outstanding members of this unit._x000D_ _x000D_ SAM is a Chief Inspector in CTU. She is decisive and never mixes personal matters with work. FA is good at martial arts and enthusiastic in her job. However, she can be very short-tempered.

programme.title: Brutally Young 2.0 - EP 5
programme.desc: Since starting out more than a decade ago, painter Yiu Sheung-him (Shaun Tam) has not much luck until gallery boss Fong Chi-ho (Joel Chan) and his wife Sung Wai-kei (Candice Chiu) discover an old painting created by Sheung-him 18 years ago. And the couple decide to help him become famous, but Sheung-him is simply not in the mood to feel happy. A moment of vanity causes Sheung-him to forgo his principles which he has been steadfastly following.

programme.title: Kung Fu Master From Guangdong - EP 10
programme.desc: The tale aims at revealing the Kung fu Master WONG KI YING’s life and his righteous character. YING and his colleagues are respected as the "Ten Tigers of Guangdong". The tale is played by Wong Yat Wa, Felix, Leung Tsang, Jay, Lau Kam Ling, Kwok Jing Hung and Kung Fu Masters from the Mainland China. The tale is shot at Yunan Kunming. Audiences will be astonished by the stylish fighting and special landscapes. One will be deeply impressed by it.

programme.title: Golden Faith - EP 38
programme.desc: BEN (LAW KA LEUNG, GALLEN) meets NAM (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) in Australia during a business trip. When he gets back to Hong Kong, he is involved in a robbery and NAM is in charge of prosecution._x000D__x000D_ BEN’s parents died in a ship accident when he was six. His brother was never found. BEN was saved by BON (CHUN PUI). BON treats him like his own son and passes his gold shop business to him.

programme.title: Golden Faith - EP 39
programme.desc: BEN (LAW KA LEUNG, GALLEN) meets NAM (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) in Australia during a business trip. When he gets back to Hong Kong, he is involved in a robbery and NAM is in charge of prosecution._x000D__x000D_ BEN’s parents died in a ship accident when he was six. His brother was never found. BEN was saved by BON (CHUN PUI). BON treats him like his own son and passes his gold shop business to him.

programme.title: Police Station No. 7 - EP 20
programme.desc: WONG YING KOO (SIT KA YIN, NANCY), a jovial optimistic middle-aged woman, is always ready to offer help to others in need. She lives happily with her daughter SUEN MAN WAH (WANG, IRENE) and other members of her family. She is a good friend of her neighbour WONG CHI CHEUNG (HUI SHIU HUNG), whose son WONG KIM (NG KAI WAH, LAWRENCE) respects her and regards her as his own mother. Corruption is a major social problem of the time in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Angels of Missio - EP 4
programme.desc: The Police Counter-Terrorism Unit (CTU) gathers intelligence to fight against terrorist attacks. Three beautiful female officers, SAM (KWOK SONIJA), FA (SHEH CHARMAINE) and BO BO (YEUNG SZE KI, SHIRLEY), who have different personalities, are outstanding members of this unit._x000D_ _x000D_ SAM is a Chief Inspector in CTU. She is decisive and never mixes personal matters with work. FA is good at martial arts and enthusiastic in her job. However, she can be very short-tempered.
